analysis.description:
Jade (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#58-173) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#99-112)

Jade.mine_jade (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#136-159) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- last_mine_time[msg.sender] == 0

Reentrancy in Jade.catch_the_thief (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#123-136):
	External calls:
	- ptc_ins.balanceOf(check_addr) < tickets (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#124-135)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#133-134)
	- levels (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#127-129)
	- levels (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#130-131)
	- levels (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#134)

Jade.ajust_time should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#68-69)
Jade.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#65)
Jade.max_level should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#67-68)
Jade.min_interval should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#69-71)
Jade.ptc_addr should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#81-83)
Jade.tickets should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#66-67)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_name' of Jade. (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#85-86) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_symbol' of Jade. (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of Jade.transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#99) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of Jade.transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#99-100) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'check_addr' of Jade.catch_the_thief (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#124) is not in mixedCase
Jade.ptc_addr (/unique_chucks/12/0x469fae48c56f1c7adac7a81d9d62452ffec686a3.sol#81-83) is never used in Jade
